subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box
author: Frank Ratka
full_text:
--0-1523208753-1195220138=:91990
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

"I have experience with them that most people just dream
about...or fear.  =
I have been carressed,  molested,  poked,  probed, 
slapped,  punched,  kno=
cked down and physically Picked Up by a Ghost."

Rod,

I have seen these wo=
rds before from many different people, both on the web and in real life. Ev=
ery one of them changed there tune when they made contact (real contact). C=
iting that they didn't know it was possible. In your words you are a ghost =
hunter and not an expert (even though you give your GH resume wanting us al=
l to believe so). Ghost hunter thrive on proof! They almost worship the wor=
ds proof and evidence. The fact is that many of us; Sumption, Bruce, Misty,=
 Steve, myself and many others have presented proof on a daily basis using =
a myriad of different methods to obtain it. The quote I have placed above, =
taken from your own post are just words. 

Open your mind a bit. As was sai=
d earlier you will experience what you expect to experience.

Frank R.

---=
-- Original Message ----
From: erick hunter <erick_hunter9@...>
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, November 15, 2007 5:42:06 PM
Subject=
: RE: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box










  


    
            =

Bruce,  the boxes aside,  I am talking about Ghosts, period.  The boxes ar=
e for simple communication,  not inter-acting.  When I say "inter-acting" I=
 don't mean trade a few words,  I'm referring to Meaningful interaction.  M=
aking a Statement,  passing on a message to me or a living relative,  predi=
cting or causing "physical" inferances.   I've experienced every kind of Gh=
ost,  I feel certain,  all over the world.  I have experience with them tha=
t most people just dream about...or fear.  I have been carressed,  molested=
,  poked,  probed,  slapped,  punched,  knocked down and physically Picked =
Up by a Ghost.  I have confronted them face-to-face while they were both vi=
sible and invisable.  I have numerous times held conversations with them vi=
a voice recorder and once even one-on-one (it was the experience
 of a life=
-time!).  I was Hunting Ghosts many, many years before it became a fad,  or=
 cool to do so.  And,  believe me,  I am far from being an "expert".  I do =
not presume on Ghosts or their personalities.  Every time in the past that =
I've done so,  I've been rocked back on my heels,  psychologically speaking=
. Some are good,  some are not.  Many of them very much enjoy making you th=
e fool (that's a lot easier done with some people than are others!) .  
It =
doesn't matter in the slightest what you Think of them,  They are what they=
 are,  and "being a friend" is definitely not on their list of priorities! =
 That goes for All of them.  They will play with you.  They will lie to you=
.  They will tell, or imply to you, what they know you want to hear,  that =
or they will laugh at you.  I have
 personally heard their laughter,  on mo=
re than one occasion.  The first step in beginning to understand Ghosts is =
to quit watching stupid TV Ghost Dramas,  and learn to be discernful about =
Reality.  God bless, anyway.        --Rod
   
   
   
   
  
bruce halliday=
 <paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. com> wrote:
      Rod,
 
No disrespect =
but how do you know what ghosts have
the where with all
 to do? I speak wit=
h them through frank and joe's box on a daily basis and consider the
two th=
at are communicating daily to be friends. I believe you are speaking of gro=
unded spirits not etherals 
and ghosts that are grounded most definately in=
teract with us. residual ghosts and hauntings do not that is why
there is a=
 distinction between the two intelligent and residual hauntings. but we are=
 not talking generaly about 
haunting spirits that communicate through fran=
k and joe's boxes, but all types of entities and don't call anyone 
dillusi=
onal unless you yourself have experienced your own research with the boxes.=

 
Bruce


 
    Bruce Halliday 
Paranormal Investigating Team 




      T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
From: erick_hunter9@ yahoo.com
Date: Thu, 15 No=
v 2007 14:18:55 -0800
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box

  =
      I certainly agree with the point of Bruces' statement,  but I fear he=
's being delusional about "friends" from the other side affecting some inte=
r-action between a box and the user,  not letting one work,  the box chosin=
g it's owner,  etc., etc., etc.  In the first place Ghosts are Not our Frie=
nds!  That's pure, unadulterated Fantasy.
  The Ghosts do not have the wher=
e-with-all to accomplish this in the first place, and even if they did they=
 don't give a rats' rear end what a Ghost Hunter does or doesn't do.  That =
boy really needs to get
 real.  Ghosts simply do not re-act to the living i=
n that way, or much of any other way except to allow us to see or hear them=
 and then only when they want it to happen.  Their most obvious and biggest=
 trait is to be totally indifferent to our wishes.   Over 40 yrs. of Invest=
igating the Paranormal has taught me nothing if it hasn't taught me this.  =
    --Rod
   
   
   velazquez <ghostchasingfool@ yahoo.com> wrote:
      H=
ere, here Bruce.  I am glad others who a genuine support my outlook, I coul=
dn't agree more!

bhali333 <paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. com> wrote:  =
    
 since I dropped the bomb about this mini box to Frank s. yesterday I =

did not expect such a fervent hoopla about it.So I will give my box 
exper=
ienced opinion after lengthy research with both Frank's and 
Joe's boxes. I=
 have contacted the manufacturer for an explanation, he 
instructed me to l=
isten to the audio file and view the demo video on 
his site. After doing s=
o my opinion on this box and the builders 
intentions for it is.

The box i=
tself is not a knock off of Frank's box but a cheap and 
ineffective versio=
n of Joe's box,It works on an AM band instead of an 
FM band as Joe's box d=
oes. Another big difference is Joe's box 
actually works and you have all h=
eard the files I have posted from 
sessions with it. After listening to thi=
s box and seeing it in 
operation I feel that anyone who purchases this box=
 will be very 
disappointed and will not receive any contact from it and ev=
en if 
they did they probably would not
 even realise it for the simple fac=
t 
that you have to have a certain amount of experience with box 
research =
and operation before developing an ear for picking up real 
time communicat=
ion and also creating a bond with the spirit friends 
on the other side and=
 also a measure of trust on both sides.

I believe the manufacturer to be a=
 capitalist and only interested in 
the monetary reward to be gained from o=
ffering this cheap and 
ineffective copy to unsuspecting and naive individu=
als who are 
interested in this medium. I do not like to bad mouth anyone, =
it 
usually comes back to bite you in the ass but I believe that our 
frien=
ds on the other side know of our intentions and would not allow 
someone wi=
th the wrong intentions to develop a working tool for 
communication. also =
I believe that a person does not pick the box the 
box picks the person. 

=
So let him have his short and lucrative run with this fooling 
unsuspecting=

 clients, bad karma always comes home.

Bruce
